description: Aberdeen's survival hopes were boosted with a narrow 1-0 win over Spartans.
title: Aberdeen secure narrow win over struggling Spartans
title_page: Aberdeen secure narrow win over struggling Spartans - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goodnight
Right I think that's enough for tonight. We'll have all the reaction over on our dedicated women's football page.
Plus, you can catch all the highlights on Sportscene tomorrow night. It's on the BBC Scotland channel at 19:30.
Catch you next weekend!
Post
FT: Hibernian 1-0 Celtic
Hibs striker Eilidh Adams tells BBC Alba: "It's an enjoyable win. I was happy to score but for it to be the winning goal is even better. I'm happy I can help the team get the three points.
"I'm just trying to get myself in the box, that's where I'm supposed to be as a striker.
"Every game is very important so it's one game at a time for us. Everything seems to be going well so we'll just continue what we're doing and taking it game by game."
FULL-TIME Hibernian 1-0 Celtic
Well well well what a massive three points for Hibs!
They end the pre-split games joint top of the SWPL, who'd have been expecting that at the start of the season?
Post
Hibernian 1-0 Celtic
Elena Sadiku is fuming on the touchline as Lucy Ashworth-Clifford's cross goes up and out.
Lauren Doran=Barr is the latest to go down with cramp.
Four minutes of the 90 to play.
